@Sarahmckd Haha maybe not the exam season stress, but the research for sources and procrastinating by reading random JStor articles I do miss XD
Imagine the job those controversial people have to do when someone calls them (insert ism/ist here) and they've got over 20k tweets to trawl through.
Every time I tweet now I look at it twice and think, 'are you going to come back and bite me in the arse at some point in the future?'
@AoifKells They take JStor away from you as soon as you graduate ðŸ˜¢

Is anyone else sick of the constant stream of American political news that flows through Twitter? I don't CARE if Melania lives at the White House or not! I feel like I'm better informed about US daily life than Irish at this stage.
@AoifKells Ha I don't miss the stress of exam season, but I miss searching through JStor and James Joyce for sources. You'll miss it too, one day!
